articles.title: First Bitcoin ETF to list on Australia’s bourse in global wave
articles.description: Exchange operator ASX Ltd., which handles the bulk of the country’s stock trading, has approved the VanEck Bitcoin ETF which will be listed on Thursday, VanEck said in a press release on Saturday.
